00030 class Declaration {

00033      int mMaxOccurs;      
00034      bool mUnbounded;

00049      int minOccurs() const { return mMinOccurs; }
00050 
00056      int maxOccurs() const { return mMaxOccurs; }
00057 
00063      int unbounded() const { return mUnbounded; }
00064 
00072      bool isList() const { return (unbounded() || maxOccurs() - minOccurs() > 1); }
00073 
00081      bool isOptional() const { return (minOccurs() == 0 && maxOccurs() == 1); }
00082 
00090      bool isSingular() const { return (minOccurs() == 1 && maxOccurs() == 1); }
00091 
00097      const std::string& getName() const { return mName; }
00098 
00104      const Type& getType() const { return *mType; }
